lead_paragraph: Local justice organizations and the A.C.L.U. asked for a temporary restraining order prohibiting the police from using strong-arm tactics against protesters.

headline.print_headline: Suit Targets Police Tactics in Baton Rouge Protests
headline.main: Rights Groups Sue Over Police Tactics in Baton Rouge Protests

snippet: Local justice organizations and the A.C.L.U. asked for a temporary restraining order prohibiting the police from using strong-arm tactics against protesters....
abstract: American Civil Liberties Union and local justice organizations in Baton Rouge, La, file suit in federal court against local and state officials over police response to protesters rallying in wake of killing of Alton Sterling; suit accuses police of abusing protesters and violating their constitutional rights.
